remarks: Elementhood in a set of relative finite intersections of an indexed family of sets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)

elrfirn $p |- ( ( B e. V /\ F : I --> ~P B ) -> ( A e. ( fi ` ( { B } u. ran F ) ) <-> E. v e. ( ~P I i^i Fin ) A = ( B i^i |^|_ y e. v ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
